entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump You are really creating unrest. Your words make this happen. You don’t care how lives are lost. By COVID-19 or by riots. Such a waste of a person in the White House.
